sentences: Aoi Morikawa (森川 葵, Morikawa Aoi, born June 17, 1995, in Aichi Prefecture, Japan) is a Japanese actress and model who is affiliated with Stardust Promotion.
Morikawa was born in Aichi Prefecture in 1995.
In 2010, Morikawa won the Seventeen's Miss Seventeen, with models such as Ayaka Miyoshi, among the 5,575 applicants.
On February 28, 2015, in an April 2015 issue of Seventeen, she was graduated from the exclusive model from the magazine.
